content:
<rule id="quarkus-config-yaml-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="smallrye-config-source-yaml" groupId="io.smallrye.config"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'smallrye-config-source-yaml' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-config-yaml' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `io.smallrye.config:smallrye-config-source-yaml` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-config-yaml`  
                        Further information in the link below.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/config#yaml" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
